sentence.Network_en: The administration has recently become silent about abuses in Haiti.

means.word_mean: 1. a republic in the West Indies on the western part of the island of Hispaniola; achieved independence from France in 1804; the poorest and most illiterate nation in the Western Hemisphere
2. an island in the West Indies
